attributes.action: express the Public majority view that Creationism is a very backward step and ban its teaching as indoctrination
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Like any other form of indoctrination, Creationism is not a rational part of education. Our system, in the main, is founded upon scientific and reasoned thinking, none of which supports Creationism.

There has been evidence of people in positions of authority following doctrinal views, and that flies in the face of democratic representation of the People. Indoctrination is anathema to a secular society.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
